# Draft:Cloud Software Solution

Cloud Software Solution
CSS was an Indian information technology services company, headquartered in Bangalore. CSS was acquired by Paulcco Global Services Pvt Ltd in 2018.
The company had business interests in e-commerce, mobile applications, digital transformation and web development. CSS had more than 25 active clients and 2 offices in over 2 countries, as of 19 December 2024. 2024 involves products, a cloud-based restaurant [https://restrobills.com/ software].
History
[https://cloudsoftwaresolution.in/landing-page CSS] initially offered small services and then developed and offered IT services with a team of twenty-five employees. At an investor meeting in 2018, he identified two countries area that would transform digitally and bring growth. In order of importance, they were Business Transformation. In 2019, CSS became a medium level organization (in employees or revenue) that is improving the growth of the IT service business. As of 2024, Cloud Software Solution (CSS) operates from over 2 countries. In India, CSS has multiple delivery centers in major cities. It has significant operations in key markets such as the United States and Singapore.
